title: Hour 1: Tim Kurkjian and Mike Schur Together
description:
Le Batard, Stugotz and the crew talk World Series with Tim Kurkjian and Mike Schur together, and comedian Brad Williams joins us in studio to discuss his Denver Broncos and to give his Top 5 short athletes of all-time. Brad is in South Florida this weekend doing comedy... Check out https://www.daniaimprov.com/ for tickets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
